Freshwater Acute: if (hardness ≥ 13.8 and ≤ 250.5) (DOC ≥ 0.3 and ≤ 17.3) {EXP(0.833*(ln(hardness mg/L))+0.240*(DOC mg/L)+0.526);} else {37}
Freshwater Chronic: if (hardness ≥ 23.4 and ≤ 399) (DOC ≥ 0.3 and ≤ 22.9) (pH ≥ 6.5 and ≤ 8.13) {EXP(0.947*(ln(hardness mg/L))-0.815*(pH)+0.398*(ln(DOC mg/L))+4.625);} else {7}
